title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: Three panel huipil with square-cut neck opening; mauve, red and white striped background with supplementary weft patterning in yellow green, magenta, purple, blue and white of flowers, the eye of God and wind; magenta embroidery at neckline.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
